title: Prepare 5.18.3 librocks build for Alpine Linux
body:
Our Linux lib is built on ubuntu, we would need either a working build script or an Alpine build.

There are sime instructions for it on our Confluence

-> NativeImport.NativeLoadException: Unable to locate rocksdb native library, either install it, or use RocksDbNative nuget package

https://github.com/one-three-three-seven/nethermind-docker

That's the Dockerfile I'm working on. Currently it's using librocksdb from the rocksdb-dev package.

@one-three-three-seven got problems to prioritize it, we are focusing on running the full JSON RPC test suite, then will look at this again
I remember that JSON RPC / eth_call was important for you too so hope that you are not too much affected by the delay here.
